resources.string: Unexpected issue, the game will be restarted automatically
No space left for game files, please free space in the memory
We are sorry that you did not like the game!
Easy Craft requires an internet connection to use all game features.\nOtherwise, you will not get updates and multiplayer will be not available!

We care about your privacy and data security. We keep this app free by showing ads.
Can we continue to use your data to tailor ads for you?

Our partners will collect data and use a unique identifier on your device to show you ads. By agreeing, you confirm that you are 16 years old. You can learn how we and our partners collect and use data on Privacy Policy.
